svg:

Things to implement:1. Migrate to Planetscale (drizzle/kysely/prisma)2. `app` router RSC3. Add "workflows"4. Setup automatic emails when video processing is done5. Allow TTS audios only when the user is sure of thetext content6. Keep things modular, for example:User should be able to add table only when necessary7. Automatic Retries and proper error handling8. Weekly/Monthly free credits9. Image picker (Avoiding all copyright issues) Unsplash, Google, Bing, etc.10. ShadCN UI, Taxonomy11. Zod validation everywhere12. Yaml instead of JSON?13. Using Chat for changing contents of each individual video section14. The UI should be like Powerpoint, with slides section on the left. Each slide represents a "scene" in the video, kind of like Windows Movie Maker.15. Different TTS engines? (Bark, MS TTS, Google, ElevenLabs, Murf.AI)
